GPS doesn\'t seem to be enabled! Please enable it in the device settings to continue!
Without the permission your current location can\'t be displayed or used!
The permission for your location is needed to display your current location on the map and for navigation!
Different map styles are available!
With this button you can change the current map style.
Show own location
With this button you can display and track your own location.
No available routes to that destination
There are %1$d steps in the route
The route request failed

Es gibt 2 Möglichkeiten, um Routen zu erstellen: 
 

Entweder du aktivierst die Standortverfolgung und die App zeichnet die Route nebenbei auf während du die gewünschte Route selbst abgehst 

Du baust dir direkt auf der Karte die Route aus Linien und Markern zusammen
No internet connection!
No internet connection could be established! Please check your connection and try again.
An internet connection is required to create a route from the waypoints!
Try again
Cancel
